dvd screener is lower quality than dvd, but higher than R5. it is sent to reviewers and critics before the release. it has a watermark id that is cropped out so that the original leaker cant be prosecuted.

KESThai - What it "clearly states" in the description and what it actually is could be 2 different things. Especially here on TPB. Thanks for playing tho...

The question was "Is this DVD, or CAM?" as I said it was neither FULL DVD or CAM but DVDSCR. That has to be taken as true until somebody says different. Jessheat obviously didn't know what DVDSCR was and should have used google to find out rather than ask. Also to ask for audio and video ratings and comments within just a few hours of the movie being posted was also rather stupid. If he/she really wanted to know then they should have downloaded and made their own comments on the quality for others to read rather than be lazy and expect others to rate it for them.

wow people are bitter as fuck on this website. DVDSCR is a "DVD Screener" sent to movie reviewers and apparently movie theaters that's only slightly lower quality than a retail DVD copy. Sometimes it can have Black & White scenes and a brief message overlay that says it's for promotional use only and not to copy it. 

I looked it up on Google, and I am not a dick. You're welcome everyone!
